item.title: To what extent has technology had a negative impact on the skill levels of people
item.description: To what extent has technology had a negative impact on the skill levels of people? Source: https://www.theknowledgeloft.com/gp-essays/gp-essay-21-to-what-extent-has-technology-had-a-negative-impact-on-the-skill-levels-of-people/ Mankind has always had a knack for finding the easy way around the most difficult tasks. Once we developed the technology needed to survive the brutal forces of nature in the Stone Age, mankind embarked on a journey of technological advancement in pursuit of a better life. Ironically, in our quest to automate and optimize our processes, we have become heavily reliant on technology, rendering many skills that were once considered fundamental and essential useless.
